recipesJson.name: Mango Dragonfruit Refresher revised
recipesJson.author: Vishousvapez
recipesJson.description:
Another iteration of my Mango Dragonfruit Refresher inspiration from the Starbucks Drink i wanted to have the Mango pop a little more and lessen the taste of dragonfruit i made this when I ran out of Cap sweet mango so I used the Mango Indian Special from FA also used the FLV boysenberry in place of TPA Blackberry because its not a stage 5 clinger. Love feedback and tweeks . I drink a Mango dragonfruit refresher everyday I highly recommend trying that and comparing it to let me know how they go together , Give it an overnight steep just to let everything settle in ... Once again Fuck any type of vape ban 


Edit: If you liked V1 and try this please let me know which you like better
